== Main inclusion report for notification-daemon ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/n/notification-daemon, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' Daemon for libnotify, which is proposed for main inclusion.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* Very young package, so no security history yet; however, it is relatively uncritical.
* Runs with normal user privilegs, spawned from session dbus.
* Source code review: clean C++ code, only few usages of manual memory management, no obvious problems found.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: no user frontend, works automatically after installation.
* Has been fixed to work on our three supported architectures, patches sent upstream.
* Cooperative upstream.
* Bugs: package not in Debian, no upstream bugs.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `cdbs` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian policy met.

=== Reviewers ===

MartinPitt: approved
